main event: A round object emitting a brilliant white light was observed in Carlsbad, New Mexico on March 15, 1962.
interesting points: The object was stationary for about 10-15 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., The sighting was reported by multiple witnesses including an Intelligence Officer., The object cast a glow over the surrounding area., The direction of the object was noted to be between 320 to 340 degrees., The observation lasted a total of 10-15 minutes.
sighted object: one round pulsating object emitting brilliant white light
